name: Bonzai Beat
description:
When you need a hassle-free way to send flowers to Japan, Bonzai Beat has you covered. Customers interested in fast flower delivery in Japan will be happy to learn about our same-day and next-day delivery options!

name: Fab Beauty
description:

We offer many types of flowers, like beautiful roses, lilies, orchids, and carnations. We also offer other gifts, such as plants and gift baskets. Japan is home to many beautiful native flowers, so your recipient is sure to receive only the most gorgeous, freshest blooms.

name: Flirty Flona
description:
Spring Flowers are beautiful and fragrant. Changing seasons have a profound effect on plant and animal life. Spring is the time of renewal of plant life. Nature awakens in Spring, and Spring Flowers bloom. Spring is a wonderful time of the year for fresh Spring Flowers, particularly Spring flower bulbs. In spring, plants and trees sprout new leaves and Flowers bloom. Spring Flowers will help you choose your fresh cut Spring Flowers or potted flowering bulbs at your local flower retailers. The details will give you some interesting information on Spring Flowers and useful tips for Spring Flower care along the way!

name: Ozzon Florist
description:
The day started with good thoughts and mood is a day well-spend. Flowers are the best way to feel the freshness and hope. Show your intense love to your dear ones by sending them Fragrant Flowers and Chocolate Gift for Sweet Sensation, Wonderful Fun Time Gift Basket, Ravishing Delicious Wishes Gift Hamper, Breathtaking Heart of Love Gift Basket a great and magnificent way to show how much you think of them. Red rose is the Flower that is traditionally been considered as the symbol of love. Purity of redness shows the passion and intensity of love towards a person, whereas on the other hand, white Flowers talk about sympathy. Likewise, each Flower has a meaning to convey. Send Stunning Tempting Moments 12 Red Roses Bouquet, Fragrant Flowers and Chocolate Gift for Sweet Sensation, Sensational Joy Forever 12 Orange Roses in a Vase, 10 Wonderful Lasting Memories Gift Basket, Unique Tender Love Mixed Floral Arrangement to your dear one and make them happy.

name: Flower Quest
description:
Sending flowers to Italy is a specialty of Flower Quest. Our extensive floral selection is a compendium of the best designs from local florists, and our floral designs are available for international flower delivery. Italy residents throughout the country can receive our deliveries quickly. Purchase flowers to help you share your feelings of love and devotion. Flowers can also send a special message on a personal or public holiday. Send birthday or anniversary flowers to Italy and make someone’s day truly memorable. After a death occurs, order sympathy arrangements with flower delivery. Italy friends and family members will receive your gift quickly and know that you care. Choosing and sending flowers to Italy is a simple task. Flower Quest has an extensive selection of colourful and fresh bouquets and arrangements online. We utilise the best florists in Italy to make beautiful arrangements that can include carnations, roses, lilies, and orchids. Design an arrangement with specific flowers to send flowers to Italy that carry a special message to someone. Or perhaps you would like to send a potted plant instead to give a lasting gift. We also offer many different gift baskets full of treats to eat and pampering products.

(From Wikipedia)

name: Crazy Tender
description:
With the abundance of greenery and freshness in the city, no wonder Bangalore is called the City Of Gardens. For the love of freshness and nature that Bangalore has, no wonder the people of Bangalore believe in the beauty of flowers and gifts. Being one of the most sought out cosmopolitan city in India owing to it being the centre of India's high-tech industry, people here are so intensively engaged in their mundane life that they don’t find time to have a look at the other side of life - friends, family and the people whom they have tagged as their loved ones. Even if they think of doing something exceptional, they lack time to plan a special event or go for purchasing a gift or a card or flowers etc. And that is why Crazy Tender has arrived in Bangalore with the amazing assortment of flowers, gifts and cakes to help you delight your dear ones like never before. Now you need not hop from one local florist in Bangalore to another in search of your choice of flowers as Crazy Tender, your trusted flower shop is here to spoil you with choices.

name: Bloom Ray
description:

Be it Weddings, birthday wishes, Mother's Day, Valentine, saying sorry, or even something as beautiful as saying a simple Miss You, you can book beautiful flowers with the perfect combination of right designs and colours at your wish. Not just this, you can also order Mother's Day flowers, Valentine Flowers, birthday flowers online which are very pleasing to the sense of fragrance along with memorable gifts that would increase the number of smiles. We are well aware of your expectations while placing the order. Your first and foremost priority is to get flowers delivered on time. Secondly, you want product to be delivered as per your expected quality. We will fulfil your expectation while ordering fresh flowers for Chennai from Bloom Ray. You can rely upon Bloom Ray’s experts for crafting the most amazing flower bouquet for timely delivery of flowers on your desired location. Our products speak for themselves.

The majority of these species are found in nature as wild mangoes. The genus belongs to the cashew family Anacardiaceae. Mangoes are native to South Asia, from where the 'common mango' or 'Indian mango', Mangifera indica, has been distributed worldwide to become one of the most widely cultivated fruits in the tropics. Other Mangifera species (e.g. horse mango, Mangifera foetida) are grown on a more localized basis.

It is the national fruit of India, Pakistan, and the Philippines, and the national tree of Bangladesh.

name: Heatherton's Grand River Florist
description:
Roses are red
Violets are blue
Sunflowers have seeds
That folks love to chew

- M.G., 2018

Helianthus annuus, the common sunflower, is a large annual forb of the genus Helianthus grown as a crop for its edible oil and edible fruits. This sunflower species is also used as wild bird food, as livestock forage (as a meal or a silage plant), in some industrial applications, and as an ornamental in domestic gardens. The plant was first domesticated in the Americas. Wild Helianthus annuus is a widely branched annual plant with many flower heads. The domestic sunflower, however, often possesses only a single large inflorescence (flower head) atop an unbranched stem. The name sunflower may derive from the flower's head's shape, which resembles the sun, or from the impression that the blooming plant appears to slowly turn its flower towards the sun as the latter moves across the sky on a daily basis.

Sunflower seeds were brought to Europe from the Americas in the 16th century, where, along with sunflower oil, they became a widespread cooking ingredient.
